verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Into the valley Come riding, come riding, Into the meadow and into the dell, Into the moonlight where shadows are gliding,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Into the forest where enemies hiding, Riding riding, Three come a riding Three come a riding Into the mouth of hell.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Into the village, Come riding, come riding, Into the hames where the sweet women dwell, Into the rests where the men are a biding.
